<div width="80%;">
<h3>Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This dataset provides yearly statistical metrics on streamflow dynamics. These data were derived with artificial neural networks (ANNs) regression, trained with 6600 monitoring and a variety of environmental predictors, such as topography and climate.
</p>

<h3>Subdatsets</h3>
| name                              | description                 |
|---------------------------------- |-----------------------------|
|`min`|Minimum streamflow|
|`mean`|Mean streamflow|
|`max`|Maximum streamflow|
</div>
